00028 #ifndef PIXELTOASTER_H
00029 #define PIXELTOASTER_H
00030 
00031 // current API version ( API is not allowed to change in point releases )
00032 
00033 #define PIXELTOASTER_VERSION 1.4
00034 
00035 // disable annoying visual c++ warnings
00036 
00037 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00038 #pragma warning( disable : 4100 )       // warning C4100: unreferenced formal parameter
00039 #pragma warning( disable : 4201 )       // warning C4201: nonstandard extension used : nameless struct/union
00040 #pragma warning( disable : 4996 )       // warning C4201: stupid visual c++ deprecated stuff
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 // platforms
00044 
00045 #define PIXELTOASTER_NULL 0
00046 #define PIXELTOASTER_APPLE 1
00047 #define PIXELTOASTER_UNIX 2
00048 #define PIXELTOASTER_WINDOWS 3
00049 
00050 #if defined(PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
00051     #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_WINDOWS
00052 #elif defined(PLATFORM_APPLE)
00053     #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_APPLE
00054 #elif defined(PLATFORM_UNIX)
00055     #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_UNIX
00056 #elif defined(PLATFORM_NULL)
00057     #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_NULL
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #ifndef PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM
00061     #if defined(_WIN32)
00062         #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_WINDOWS
00063     #elif defined(__APPLE__)
00064         #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_APPLE
00065     #elif defined(linux) || defined(__linux) || defined(__linux__) || defined(__CYGWIN__)
00066         #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_UNIX
00067     #else
00068         #define PIXELTOASTER_PLATFORM PIXELTOASTER_NULL
00069     #endif
00070 #endif
00071 
00072 // 32 or 64 bits?
00073 
00074 #if defined(__LP64__) || defined(__64BIT__) || defined(_LP64) || (__WORDSIZE == 64)
00075     #define PIXELTOASTER_64BIT
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 // endianness
00079 
00080 #if defined(__LITTLE_ENDIAN__)
00081     #define PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #if defined(__BIG_ENDIAN__)
00085     #define PIXELTOASTER_BIG_ENDIAN
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 #if !defined(PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN) && !defined (PIXELTOASTER_BIG_ENDIAN)
00089     #if defined(PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
00090         #define PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00091     #elif defined(PLATFORM_APPLE)
00092         #define PIXELTOASTER_BIG_ENDIAN
00093     #else
00094         #define PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00095     #endif
00096 #endif
00097 
00098 #if defined(PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN) && defined(PIXELTOASTER_BIG_ENDIAN)
00099     #error cannot define both big and little endian!
00100 #endif
00101 
00102 #if !defined(PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN) && !defined(PIXELTOASTER_BIG_ENDIAN)
00103     #error endianness not defined
00104 #endif
00105 
00106 // dynamic linking
00107 
00108 #if defined(_WIN32) && defined(PIXELTOASTER_DYNAMIC)
00109     #ifdef PIXELTOASTER_DLL
00110         #define PIXELTOASTER_API __declspec(dllexport)
00111     #else
00112         #define PIXELTOASTER_API __declspec(dllimport)
00113     #endif
00114 #else
00115     #define PIXELTOASTER_API
00116 #endif

00139     typedef unsigned int integer32;             
00140     typedef unsigned short integer16;           
00141     typedef unsigned char integer8;

00175     class FloatingPointPixel
00176     {
00177     public:
00178         
00180 
00181         FloatingPointPixel()
00182         {
00183             a = 0.0f;
00184             r = 0.0f;
00185             g = 0.0f;
00186             b = 0.0f;
00187         }
00188 
00190 
00191         FloatingPointPixel( float r, float g, float b, float a = 0.0f )
00192         {
00193             this->r = r;
00194             this->g = g;
00195             this->b = b;
00196             this->a = a;
00197         }
00198 
00199         float a;        
00200         float b;        
00201         float g;        
00202         float r;        
00203     };          
00204 
00206 
00207     typedef FloatingPointPixel Pixel;       
00208 
00245     union TrueColorPixel
00246     {
00248 
00249         TrueColorPixel()
00250         {
00251             integer = 0;
00252         }
00253         
00255 
00256         TrueColorPixel( integer8 r, integer8 g, integer8 b, integer8 a = 0 )
00257         {
00258             this->r = r;
00259             this->g = g;
00260             this->b = b;
00261             this->a = a;
00262         }
00263 
00265         
00266         explicit TrueColorPixel( integer32 i )
00267         {
00268             integer = i;
00269         }
00270 
00271         integer32 integer;          
00272         
00273         struct
00274         {
00275             #ifdef PIXELTOASTER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00276 
00277                 integer8 b;         
00278                 integer8 g;         
00279                 integer8 r;         
00280                 integer8 a;         
00281 
00282             #else
00283 
00284                 integer8 a;         
00285                 integer8 r;         
00286                 integer8 g;         
00287                 integer8 b;         
00288 
00289             #endif
00290         };
00291     };

00338     class Mode
00339     {
00340     public:
00341 
00344 
00345         enum Enumeration
00346         {
00347             TrueColor,                  
00348             FloatingPoint               
00349         };
00350 
00353 
00354         Mode()
00355         {
00356             enumeration = FloatingPoint;
00357         }
00358 
00362 
00363         Mode( Enumeration enumeration )
00364         {
00365             this->enumeration = enumeration;
00366         }
00367 
00371 
00372         operator Enumeration() const
00373         {
00374             return enumeration;
00375         }
00376 
00377     private:
00378 
00379         Enumeration enumeration;
00380     };

00382     // this is an internal class representing the set of supported pixel formats.
00383     // because conversion occurs automatically when you update the display the details of the underlying display format are hidden.
00384     // if we decide to expose the converter class as a publically supported class, then this class must also become public.
00385 
00386     class Format
00387     {
00388     public:
00389 
00392 
00393         enum Enumeration
00394         {
00395             Unknown,        
00396             XRGB8888,       
00397             XBGR8888,       
00398             RGB888,         
00399             BGR888,         
00400             RGB565,         
00401             BGR565,         
00402             XRGB1555,       
00403             XBGR1555,       
00404             XBGRFFFF,       
00405         };
00406 
00408 
00409         Format()
00410         {
00411             enumeration = Unknown;
00412         }
00413 
00417 
00418         Format( Enumeration enumeration )
00419         {
00420             this->enumeration = enumeration;
00421         }
00422 
00426 
00427         operator Enumeration() const
00428         {
00429             return enumeration;
00430         }
00431 
00432     private:
00433 
00434         Enumeration enumeration;
00435     };

00760     // internal display interface
00761 
00762     class DisplayInterface
00763     {
00764     public:
00765 
00766         virtual ~DisplayInterface() {};
00767 
00768         virtual bool open( const char title[], int width, int height, Output output = Output::Default, Mode mode = Mode::FloatingPoint ) = 0;
00769         virtual void close() = 0;
00770 
00771         virtual bool open() const = 0;
00772 
00773         virtual bool update( const FloatingPointPixel pixels[] ) = 0;
00774         virtual bool update( const TrueColorPixel pixels[] ) = 0;
00775 
00776         virtual const char * title() const = 0;
00777         virtual int width() const = 0;
00778         virtual int height() const = 0;
00779         virtual Mode mode() const = 0;
00780         virtual Output output() const = 0;
00781 
00782         virtual void listener( class Listener * listener ) = 0;
00783         virtual class Listener * listener() const = 0;
00784 
00785         virtual void wrapper( DisplayInterface * wrapper ) = 0;
00786         virtual DisplayInterface * wrapper() = 0;
00787     };

00838     class Display : public DisplayInterface
00839     {
00840     public:
00841 
00844 
00845         Display()
00846         {
00847             internal = createDisplay();
00848             internal->wrapper( this );
00849         }
00850 
00854         
00855         Display( const char title[], int width, int height, Output output = Output::Default, Mode mode = Mode::FloatingPoint )
00856         {
00857             internal = createDisplay();
00858             internal->wrapper( this );
00859             open( title, width, height, output, mode );
00860         }
00861 
00864 
00865         ~Display()
00866         {
00867             if ( internal )
00868             {
00869                 delete internal;
00870                 internal = 0;
00871             }
00872         }
00873 
00882 
00883         bool open( const char title[], int width, int height, Output output = Output::Default, Mode mode = Mode::FloatingPoint )
00884         {
00885             if ( internal )
00886                 return internal->open( title, width, height, output, mode );
00887             else
00888                 return false;
00889         }
00890 
00894 
00895         void close()
00896         {
00897             if (internal)
00898                 internal->close();
00899         }
00900 
00902 
00903         bool open() const
00904         {
00905             if ( internal )
00906                 return internal->open();
00907             else
00908                 return false;
00909         }
00910 
00919 
00920         bool update( const class FloatingPointPixel pixels[] )
00921         {
00922             if ( internal )
00923                 return internal->update( pixels );
00924             else
00925                 return false;
00926         }
00927 
00936 
00937         bool update( const TrueColorPixel pixels[] )
00938         {
00939             if (internal)
00940                 return internal->update( pixels );
00941             else
00942                 return false;
00943         }
00944 
00945 #ifndef PIXELTOASTER_NO_STL
00946 
00951 
00952         bool update( const vector<FloatingPointPixel> & pixels )
00953         {
00954             return update( &pixels[0] );
00955         }
00956 
00961 
00962         bool update( const vector<TrueColorPixel> & pixels )
00963         {
00964             return update( &pixels[0] );
00965         }
00966 
00967 #endif
00968 
00970 
00971         const char * title() const
00972         {
00973             if (internal)
00974                 return internal->title();
00975             else
00976                 return "";
00977         }
00978 
00980 
00981         int width() const
00982         {
00983             if ( internal )
00984                 return internal->width();
00985             else
00986                 return 0;
00987         }
00988 
00990 
00991         int height() const
00992         {
00993             if ( internal )
00994                 return internal->height();
00995             else
00996                 return 0;
00997         }
00998 
01000 
01001         Mode mode() const
01002         {
01003             if ( internal )
01004                 return internal->mode();
01005             else
01006                 return Mode::FloatingPoint;
01007         }
01008 
01010         
01011         Output output() const
01012         {
01013             if ( internal )
01014                 return internal->output();
01015             else
01016                 return Output::Default;
01017         }
01018 
01022 
01023         void listener( class Listener * listener )
01024         {
01025             if (internal)
01026                 internal->listener( listener );
01027         }
01028 
01031 
01032         class Listener * listener() const
01033         {
01034             if ( internal )
01035                 return internal->listener();
01036             else
01037                 return 0;
01038         }
01039 
01040         void wrapper( class DisplayInterface * wrapper ) 
01041         {
01042             // wrapper is always this
01043         }
01044 
01045         class DisplayInterface * wrapper()
01046         {
01047             return this;
01048         }
01049 
01050     private:
01051 
01052         DisplayInterface * internal;
01053     };

01055     // internal timer interface
01056 
01057     class TimerInterface
01058     {
01059     public:
01060         virtual ~TimerInterface() {};
01061         virtual void reset() = 0;
01062         virtual double time() = 0;
01063         virtual double delta() = 0;
01064         virtual double resolution() = 0;
01065         virtual void wait( double seconds ) = 0;
01066     };
01067 
01095     class Timer
01096     {
01097     public:
01098 
01100 
01101         Timer()
01102         {
01103             internal = createTimer();
01104         }
01105 
01106         ~Timer()
01107         {
01108             delete internal;
01109             internal = NULL;
01110         }
01111 
01113 
01114         void reset()
01115         {
01116             if ( internal )
01117                 internal->reset();
01118         }
01119 
01122 
01123         double time()
01124         {
01125             if ( internal )
01126                 return internal->time();
01127             else
01128                 return 0.0;
01129         }
01130 
01134 
01135         double delta()
01136         {
01137             if ( internal )
01138                 return internal->delta();
01139             else
01140                 return 0.0;
01141         }
01142 
01146 
01147         double resolution()
01148         {
01149             if ( internal )
01150                 return internal->resolution();
01151             else
01152                 return 0.0;
01153         }
01154 
01157 
01158         void wait( double seconds )
01159         {
01160             if ( internal )
01161                 internal->wait( seconds );
01162         }
01163 
01164     private:
01165 
01166         TimerInterface * internal;
01167     };

01305 
01306         bool defaultKeyHandlers() const { return true; }

01312 
01313         virtual void onKeyDown( DisplayInterface & display, Key key ) { }
01314 
01319 
01320         virtual void onKeyPressed( DisplayInterface & display, Key key ) {}

01326 
01327         virtual void onKeyUp( DisplayInterface & display, Key key ) {}

01333 
01334         virtual void onMouseButtonDown( DisplayInterface & display, Mouse mouse ) {}

01340 
01341         virtual void onMouseButtonUp( DisplayInterface & display, Mouse mouse ) {}
01342 
01347 
01348         virtual void onMouseMove( DisplayInterface & display, Mouse mouse ) {}
01349 
01354 
01355         virtual void onActivate( DisplayInterface & display, bool active ) {}
01356 
01360 
01361         virtual void onOpen( DisplayInterface & display ) {}
01362 
01371 
01372         virtual bool onClose( DisplayInterface & display ) { return true; }
01373     };

01375     // internal converter interface
01376 
01377     class Converter
01378     {
01379     public:
01380         virtual ~Converter() {};
01381         virtual void begin() = 0;
01382         virtual void convert( const void * source, void * destination, int pixels ) = 0;
01383         virtual void end() = 0;
01384     };
